Reviews.Title: HTC Desire Z
Reviews.Author: John V. Dondero
Reviews.Content: What I got was not a "desire z" with htc sense... They just sent me a G2 which is basically the same thing without the Sense overlay. Even though it is not what I ordered, the phone still works fantastic and I will probably keep it. It is T-mobile branded but works well on At&t; network. Great smartphone and a great buy. If you are in the market for an unlocked smartphone this is a great choice for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Ben W.
Reviews.Content: My order came in a couple days early like they said and im loving this phone already. Easy to use and the keyboard is just so good to text on.

Reviews.Title: HTC deire Z review
Reviews.Author: Chiara
Reviews.Content: I ordered the black HTC Desire Z and I obtained the grey one. For me is not a problem and it works very well, but you should pay more attention. Someone could return it for this reason.The product is perfect, good deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cellphone
Reviews.Author: Leninffer
Reviews.Content: That was just I was looking for!!! excellent phone with the right price. Easy to learn and drive. For the people outside of the united stated be carfull with the Telecommunication band of their countries.

Reviews.Title: Good but the battery...
Reviews.Author: Rafael A Maceira
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone in all respects, the camera is extremely good, but I leave this point against it is the battery life is extremely bad, the HTC should experience of taking a long battery life, I miss my nokia, lasted an weeks using it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Fantastico Smarthphone!!!
Reviews.Author: German Quinteros
Reviews.Content: Es un fantastico smarthphone,  personalmente me ha llamado la atencionlos de la marca HTC, y he de decir que hasta el momento he quedado complacidolo recomiendo ampliamente atravez de Amazon, gracias por tener productostan innovadores!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Bluetooth, S-LCD capacitive touchscreen
QWERTY keyboard,1.5 GB, Wi-Fi
5 MP Camera, Geo-tagging, face detection
Facebook, Twitter for HTC Sense, Google Search, Maps, Gmail
3.7 inches Touch screen
5 MP Camera, 2592 x 1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash. HD Video 720p
Android OS, v2.2 (Froyo)
GSM 850/900/1800/1900, HSDPA 1900/2100
Slide-out QWERTY keyboard
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Desire Z A7272 Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 5 MP Camera, HD video and Wi-Fi -International Version - Gray
